migration.restrictedToDev: Migration functionality is restricted to development environments
migration.developerTool: Developer tool for migrating training data to Supabase database
migration.unauthorizedDescription: Database migration functionality is only available to developers in development environments. You will be redirected to the dashboard shortly.
migration.ensureDevMode: Ensure you're running in development mode
migration.devEnvironmentDescription: This migration tool is only available in development environments. It will not be accessible in production builds.
migration.runDryRun: Run a dry run first to preview changes
migration.verifyCurriculums: Verify all curriculums were created correctly
migration.testLessonLoading: Test lesson loading and content generation
migration.updateApplication: Update application to use database instead of static data
migration.secureEndpoints: Remove or secure migration endpoints for production
